name: ListCustomAccountingFields
description:
Retrieve a list of custom accounting fields.

Use this tool to get a list of custom fields used in accounting. It should be called when you need to understand the available custom accounting fields in the system.

parameters.name: filter_by_remote_id
parameters.description: Filter results by the Remote/external ID of custom accounting fields within the ERP system.

value_schema.description: Filter by Remote/external ID of custom accounting fields in ERP system.

parameters.name: pagination_start_id
parameters.description: ID of the last entity from the previous page for pagination.

value_schema.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: The number of results to return per page, between 2 and 100. Defaults to 20 if not specified.

value_schema.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

parameters.name: include_only_active
parameters.description: Set to True to include only active fields, False for inactive, or omit for all.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

parameters.name: remote_id
parameters.description: Filter by Remote/external ID of custom accounting fields in ERP system.

value_schema.description: Filter by Remote/external ID of custom accounting fields in ERP system.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

value_schema.description: The ID of the last entity of the previous page, used for pagination to get the next page.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

value_schema.description: The number of results to be returned in each page. The value must be between 2 and 100. If not specified, the default value 20 will be used.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
